summary: If you like role playing like and shortly after completing Dragon born i wanted my office to be more fitting...
descriptionHtml:
Basically all this is, is a total conversion of the Arch-mage\'s and only the arch mages quarters. The room has been completely re-done to look like its part of Apocrypha ... so as of saying his influence has spread there becuase .. well if you\'ve played Dragonborn(You NEED dragonborn for this) you\'re practically his \'servant\' now so this is just for role playing purpose\'s.

NEED DRAGONBORN FOR THIS.
To install place this in the data folder and tick the box in the mod manager 

This mod should\'nt conflict with the quest line, i made sure of it, but i do recommend installing it after you\'ve completed the quest line.
author: lok195
